name: Obstruction
description:
In Obstruction, you have to guide a red laser through the level using mirrors which you can push around.

You can walk with WSAD and do screenshots with H.

Beware of glitches. There's a lot of them that I don't understand at all because of my gibberish code. Anyway, good luck and have fun. Note: even though the glitches every level is possible, some might just be a little hard.
